ygData.subject: Re: The Feeling Of Love
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She smiled and stopped at the door.  She looked at Hotrod and smiled.  She turned off the room lights and shut the door to the room. And a few hours later:

::Feline::

She smiled and stopped at the door.  She looked at Hotrod and 
smiled.  She turned off the room lights and shut the door to the room.


And a few hours later:
She woke up and left the room .....again.
She walked to the lab.  She felt like she needed a recharge.  She 
stepped into a CR chamber and enjoyed the feeling of renewing her 
energy levels.  

She stepped out of the chamber and looked around.  She sat on the 
bench stool and smiled.  This was one fun assignment.  SHe smiled and 
mumbled to herself. "Wow, if love is like this, I hope it never 
stops." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He went in, and layed on his bed.
> He had left the door open for Feline.
